executiveSummary: Analysis across three key pillars (Spectral, Visual Code Editors, Sourcegraph) reveals a massive shift towards AI-native development environments. While 'Spectral' conversation is fragmented between high-end optics/physics and niche memes, the 'Visual Code Editor' landscape is being disrupted by Google's new Antigravity and AI agents. Sourcegraph's spin-off of AmpCode signals a strategic pivot in the industry. Risk factors are moderate, driven primarily by conspiracy theories within the 'Spectral' search term (NASA/UFO narratives) and intense competitor sentiment in the dev tools space.
